news.text: ERZGEBIRGSKRIMI - MORDHOLZ S02 F04 / jetzt in der ZDF Mediathek
DRII WINTER is awarded with the SWISS FILM AWARD 2023 for BEST FICTION FILM
IRGENDWANN WERDEN WIR UNS ALLES ERZÄHLEN / SOMEDAY WE´LL TELL EACH OTHER EVERYTHING celebrates its WORLD PREMIERE in COMPETITION at 73rd BERLINALE 2023
DRII WINTER celebrates its WORLD PREMIERE in COMPETITION at 72nd BERLINALE 2022 and receives a SPECIAL MENTION by the International Jury
SARAH PLAYS A WEREWOLF celebrates its WORLD PREMIERE at 74TH VENICE FILM FESTIVAL/ 32nd INTERNATIONAL CRITICS WEEK
SIVAS is selected as Turkey´s official Oscar entry for BEST FOREIGN LANGUAGE FILM category at the 88th Academy Awards 2016
SIVAS is awarded with the SPECIAL JURY PRIZE at 71st VENICE FILM FESTIVAL/ COMPETITION
WHITE SHADOW is awarded with the LION OF THE FUTURE at 70th VENICE FILM FESTIVAL/ INTERNATIONAL CRITICS WEEK
